# authorizationViewShouldDeauthorize(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sent to the delegate when a user clicks the open lock icon.

## Declaration

```swift
func authorizationViewShouldDeauthorize(_ view: SFAuthorizationView!) -> Bool
```

## Discussion

The delegate can react to this before deauthorization happens and avoid it by returning [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NO]. This delegate method is not called when you call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SecurityInterface/SFAuthorizationView/deauthorize(_:)] method.

## Related Documentation

- **deauthorize(_:)**: Sets the authorization state to unauthorized and locks the lock icon in the view.
